title: Hextech Issues
body: Hello league of legends, i would like to ask nicely why there is a "**Hextech Annie**" skin, which can only be unlocked in the hextech crafting, Whilst there is a "**Hextech Anivia**" skin which us players can purchase via the store. _Please Rito fix your shit_...

replies.body: There is also Hextech Janna, Sion, Singed and Galio
